column4: doug, ubuntu is quite low maintenance, but id really go for 8.04 rather than 8.10 personally
seems like the 8.10 kernel is barfing on the hardware i'm trying to boot it on
its a gigabyte board, sb600 / 790fx chipset with a athlon64-x2 and a hd-3870. nothing super bleeding edge, some of the pci cards aren't super well supported
